summary: The love story between an actress and a director, inspired by the life of the late south Indian actress Silk Smitha.
cast: Vidya Balan|Emraan Hashmi|Tusshar Kapoor|Naseeruddin Shah|Rajesh Sharma|Neha Bam|Devyani|Lavin Gothi|Imran Hasnee|Mangala Kenkre|Anju Mahendru|A.R. Manikandan|Dilip Merala|Gulshan Pandey|Vikas Shrivastav|Shivani Tanksale|Atul Singh Verma|Arya Banerjee
title: The Dirty Picture
